entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 17 April 2023
